title: Student Ambassador
subtitle: Higher Education Award
description:
Awarded for representing the school of computing on PlayExpo 2016 Blackpool

I've shown the playable demo of my multiplayer game (Call of Magic) and allowed over 40 people to experience it. They all enjoyed it thoroughly.
